channel.title: Projects on Balashov Artem
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Balashov Artem

item.title: Technological stresses of integral constructions
item.description: Design of stiffened composite panels with account process technological deformation. Goals Introduction Analytic model FEA Experimental model Source code Conclusion Goals The main purpose if to make an analytic model to considering technological deflected mode (Stress-Strain condition, or SSC) while design an integral structure. (By intagral means structure, that made from 2 or more parts and formed at the same time). First step objectives: * Investigation influence of structural parameters integral construction on technological deflected mode in terms of stringer set panel.

item.title: Automatization of Abaqus FEA using python
item.description: In this paper I will describe how to automate Abaqus Finite Element Analyses using python script on example of optimization plain panel from composite material under equal pressure distribution. Contents Introduction Initial data Work in GUI Modeling CM Loads and BC Result export Scripts generation and formatting Main file adjustment Making template Parsing result file Iteration optimization Main file optimization Conclusion Introduction The main point of this whole work is to replace action sequence in GUI by formatted scripts.

item.title: LA-156 Wing skin
item.description: Design of an LA-156 Wing skin. Contents Introduction Work scheme Input data Parametrize Master-Geometry Calculating Pressure type allocation Adhesive connection Skin types comprasion Figurativly parts Modeling FEM calculation Technology and manufacturing Segments lining Modling frame Materials and equipment list Conclusion Tech-documentation Introduction The aim of this work was a design of covering for the wing LA-156, as a part of acomplex teamwork. The operation loads of the skin panels were calculated based on the rationing loads of the wing.
